ModMetaData.name: ED-Shields-CR
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 02.00.00 Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18995 Please Use that Thread for Discussion / Feedback that would like me to reply to. Ideally Bugs should be logged on GitHub although in the discussion thread is also fine.
Requires: ED-ShieldsBasic, CombatRealism * CombatRealism-1.6.9.4 * ED-ShieldsBasic 03.00.00
Modifies the Shields from ED-ShieldsBasic to intercept the projectiles fired by weapons from Combat Realism.
